changeSet.sql: delete from smtparameters where sysparmcode in('GCD_CUSTOMER_DRIVER','GCD_CUSTOMER_URL','GCD_CUSTOMER_USERNAME','GCD_CUSTOMER_PWD');

changeSet.sql: update reportfilterfields set FieldDbname='t.fintype' where reportid in (select reportid from reportconfiguration where menuitemcode='menu_Item_PendingFinances') and fieldid=1;
